summary_md: Poland's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 17,984 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with a moderate inflation rate of 3.79% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The unemployment rate stands at 2.47% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), while the average life expectancy is 78.51 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country has a significant internet user base, accounting for 86.40%% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). Poland's GDP from exports is 52.33%% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Poland's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 17,984 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with a moderate inflation rate of 3.79% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The country's GDP from exports is 52.33%% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The unemployment rate in Poland is 2.47% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable job market.
sections.digital_md: With an internet user base accounting for 86.40%% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Poland is well-integrated into the digital economy.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Poland is 78.51 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's health environment.
